Reviews.Author: yl_len246
Reviews.Content: checked hotel 2 nights hotels time size shoebox fit 6 people extra bed simply mattress floor devoid space walk furnishings outdated maybe theme decor tried breakfast eat dining possitive 35 mins walk outram mrt station walking distance chinatown courteous reception stay else

Reviews.Title: “Only the double rooms are worth it”
Reviews.Author: JabberwockyIndia
Reviews.Content: double charming style furniture cramped single useless windows recommend staying hotel windows facing main road else avoid instead stay singapore star hotels service cheerful breakfast sparse juice microwaved eggs milk toast breakfast space cramped 8 crowd admit entrance facade lobbies look impressive wish added walkway space instead hotel thankfully elevator internet unfortunately lobby charged 10 sing dollars day lobby photos books read hotels

Reviews.Content: stayed nights hotel found excellent value especially staying f1 grand prix weekend hotel overcharging left clean staff helpful hotel located close mrt chinatown hawker centres close definitely consider staying visit

Reviews.Title: “Nice Location”
Reviews.Author: kakek_ganas
Reviews.Content: book hotel internet staff helpfull hospitality improved greeting guest morning etc thats main size bathroom location superb near chinatown hang bar near seven walk outram park city interchange mrt bus station recommend breakfast standard lot breakfast outside choose ur fave food type nasi lemak nasi padang chinese reasonable price
